topic.title: Hospital Admission Diagnosis Section - conformance rules

section.p: The Hospital Admitting Diagnosis Section contains information about the primary reason for admission to a hospital facility.

ol.li: SHALL conform to IHE Hospital Admission Diagnosis Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.3)
